column4: I'm having a brain fart (too much stuff going on in my life), what's the command to upgrade from 9.10->10.04, using apt-get or aptitude?  I'm thinking "aptitude dist-upgrade..." Am I correct?
you have to change your sources first for that to work, I think
OK, I thought it might be something like that.
don't trust my advice on that too much, I don't actually use ubuntu ;P
